data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Chun-Lin, Yang, Ping-Shih, Wang, Chuan-Chan (2016): Two new species of Megistophylla Burmeister (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae) from Taiwan, with notes on the genus. Zootaxa 4126 (2): 240-250, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4126.2.4
